content: Two units of Massachusetts-based software company PTC Inc will pay a total of $28 million to resolve probes into whether they gave more than $1 million in recreational travel to officials from China  two U.S. government agencies said on Tuesday.
name: PTC Inc
title: Tech company PTC to pay $28 mln to resolve U.S. bribery probes

content: Feb 16 Two units of Massachusetts-based software company PTC Inc will pay a total of $28 million to resolve probes into whether they gave more than $1 million in recreational travel to officials from China  two U.S. government agencies said on Tuesday.
name: PTC Inc
title: UPDATE 3-Tech company PTC to pay $28 mln to resolve U.S. bribery probes
